plot outline: Mooka Hakki follows the life and times of three nomadic siblings. The film chronicles how the trio refuses to be bogged down by their hardships and the discrimination they face from the society, and strives to aspire for better things in life.
title: Mooka Hakki
plot: _Mooka Hakki_ (qv) follows the life and times of three nomadic siblings. The film chronicles how the trio refuses to be bogged down by their hardships and the discrimination they face from the society, and strives to aspire for better things in life.
